name: Impaled -
matches: With an heroic effort you manage to writhe yourself free from the weapon that impaled you.
^With a vicious snarl \w+ carves a merciless swathe through your steaming guts\. You gurgle and choke as s?he withdraws (?:his|her) dripping blade, glistening with gore\.$
^Searing pain tears through your midsection as you wrench away from (?:[A-Z][a-z]+), (?:his|her) weapon ripping unceremoniously through your innards\.$
^With a snarl of contempt, \w+ allows you to slide free of (?:her|his) weapon\.$
